Reviews.Title: As Promised
Reviews.Author: BDS
Reviews.Content: Needed a backup laptop and didn't want to buy a new unit.  Had one of these a few years back and thought it would do the job.  The order arrived as promised and in the condition that was promised, actually a little better software than I expected.  Runs great.

Reviews.Title: hp 2510p
Reviews.Author: kenneth t.
Reviews.Content: Very good laptop came on time as described  replaced the battery no problem would purchase again.  Operates as described  excellent price.  Kenneth t.

Reviews.Title: It works great
Reviews.Author: Ashante
Reviews.Content: My daughter bought this several months ago and it is still working great. It heats up and shuts off though; I'm not sure if that is due mostly to her or the brand

Reviews.Title: Good Laptop
Reviews.Author: Miguel KOUAKOU
Reviews.Content: Good refurbished LaptopI am very gladI don't need to say moreall is ok concerning the qualityThx
